original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Public Utilities Commission will meet today to approve the electricity bill reduction proposal presented by the Ceylon Electricity Board.
A Senior official said public consultation on the relevant proposal was recently completed.
Accordingly, the CEB has also proposed to reduce the electricity tariff in domestic and religious places up to 30 units by 23% and the electricity tariff in hotels and factories by 29 to 40%
